message: Driving too fast for conditions......again.

, historically to present, the majority of scientists do not agree with the concept of man-made Carbon Dioxide emissions significantly affecting climate - which at present is called Global Climate Change. As governments saw an ability to harness funds and a third party evil to unite their citizenry around in order to better control that population, governments created positions to further understand how to use such a concept. Think it through. They did not hire individuals who did not agree with the end-goal of human control. They hired individuals who would agree with what their goals. Notice how all the big names left the government side of the industry in the 90's and early 00's? The A crowd. There is a reason. They were replaced with the C & D crowd who will hawk whatever they are told to hawk for a paycheck. That is not science. That is neither good governance nor good long-term policy creation. But it is a great way to usher in control to which most reasonable people would object under any other circumstance.
...Said the guy who wants to be a pumpkin.

10104261156081125 Actually, Reagan's best acting job was the 8 years in the White House. He gave the appearance of being presidential saying words written by others in a """"folksy"""" manner - all the while making deals with Iran to delay the release of the hostages; selling weapons to Iran in violation of U.S. law; stealing the proceeds of the illegal weapon sales and giving it to terrorists in Central America in violation of U.S. law; doubling the national debt with tax cuts and outrageous military spending; destroying the middle-class with """"trickle down"""" economics; nearly destroying the Savings & Loan industry with deregulation and no oversight; and fostering the """"junk bond"""" industry and it's devastation of jobs and industries with """"leveraged buyouts"""".
